content: knit 1 round in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 1 round in color a cut color a after this round continue knitting every round in color b until 3 5 shorter than desired foot length then fade back to color a and work toe in color a as follows attach color a and knit 1 round in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 3 rounds in color a knit 2 rounds in color b knit 4 rounds in color a knit 1 round in color b cut color b knit 4 rounds in color a work toe continuing in color a as follows round 1 knit round 2 decrease round k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of instep k2tog k1 repeat across sole stitches repeat rounds 1 2 until 20 20 24 24 24 28 stitches remain 10 10 12 12 12 14 per needle graft with kitchener stitch weave in loose ends ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 6 shadow wrap short row ksw knit shadow wrap with right hand needle lift the top of the stitch below the next stitch so the mama of the next stitch onto left hand needle knit the lifted stitch being careful not to twist it slip the new st back onto left needle it will look like 2 sts twin are made from the same stitch this stitch and its shadow will be worked together as one stitch psw purl shadow wrap slip next st onto right hand needle with left hand needle lift the top of the mama st of that stitch you just slipped and purl the lifted st slip both sts twin sts back onto left hand needle this stitch and its shadow will be worked together as one stitch tksw triplet knit shadow wrap work as ksw it will look like 3 sts triplet are made from the same stitch tpsw triplet purl shadow wrap work as psw to form triplet sts here is a link for a good tutorial on shadow wrap short row https //socktopusunplugged wordpress com/2011/02/05/short-row-shadow-wraps/ ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 7
